text: Welcome to Big Palladium.^9 My name is Wollahyde.

name: Wollahyde
text: I'm in the business of buying, selling, and handling Palladium. It's a rare,^9 beautiful metal.

name: Wollahyde
text: Oh.^9 All by yourself today?^9 I'll bet you thought there'd be some.^5.^5.^5computer players,^8 or something.

name: Wollahyde
text: I'm not about that computerized trading. I let the Quantitative Finance majors do that kinda thing. Anyway...

name: Wollahyde
text: The market is highly volatile right now, and the right predictions will make it B^9I^9G^9! That's where you come in.^9 Let's start with this:
